name: streaming-enhanced
description: Automatically skip Ads, Intros, Credits and add Speed Control, etc. on Netflix, Prime video, Disney+ & Hotstar and Crunchyroll.

scripts.start-android: adb devices && web-ext run -t firefox-android --firefox-apk org.mozilla.firefox --adb-device 38091FDJH002WH
scripts.build: node copyFtoC.js && cd firefox && web-ext build  --overwrite-dest && cd ../chrome/ && web-ext build --overwrite-dest
scripts.zip: cd firefox && web-ext build  --overwrite-dest && cd ../chrome/ && web-ext build --overwrite-dest

author: Marvin Krebber
